recommendations.name: Bali
recommendations.description: A tropical paradise known for its beaches, temples, and vibrant culture.

recommendations.name: Kyoto
recommendations.description: A historic city in Japan famous for its temples, gardens, and traditional culture.

recommendations.name: Paris
recommendations.description: The capital of France, known for its art, fashion, and iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower.

recommendations.name: Santorini
recommendations.description: A stunning Greek island with white-washed buildings and breathtaking sunsets.

recommendations.name: Machu Picchu
recommendations.description: An ancient Incan city nestled in the Andes Mountains of Peru.
